value.title: Meet Aria, the first New Zealand English accented voice for Amazon Polly – includes limited te reo Māori support
value.excerpt: We are excited to announce Aria, Amazon Polly’s first New Zealand English Neural text-to-speech (NTTS) voice. Similar to other Amazon Polly voices, Aria is developed as a voice that sounds bright, natural, and upbeat. This new voice for Aotearoa (New Zealand in Māori) is uniquely Kiwi. It includes a

value.title: AI Weekly: Algorithmic discrimination highlights the need for regulation
value.excerpt: Companies are still misusing algorithms, leading to discrimination. It points to the need for more regulation.

value.title: Making Virtual Learning Real
value.excerpt: Universities have deployed virtual labs, educational digital twins and machine learning to innovate online education.

value.title: Key Ways Artificial Intelligence Can Improve Recruiting In The Hiring Process
value.excerpt: A number of companies have turned to AI to improve their recruiting—a task that once required hours of sorting through resumes, calling applicants and scheduling interviews to find the perfect candidate.

value.title: A New AI Technology Might Help Detect Gastric Cancer
value.excerpt: Each year, one million patients around the globe are diagnosed with stomach cancer. Can a new cancer-detecting AI help save lives?

value.title: SenseTime, artificial intelligence platform founded by CUHK professors, files to raise at least US$2 billion in Hong Kong IPO
value.excerpt: SenseTime Group , China’s largest artificial intelligence (AI) company, filed to go public in Hong Kong on Friday in one of the biggest technology offerings since Beijing cracked down on the country’s tech sector last month,

value.title: A standard for artificial intelligence in biomedicine
value.excerpt: An international research team with participants from several universities including the FAU has proposed a standardized registry for artificial intelligence (AI) work in biomedicine to improve the reproducibility of results and create trust in the use of AI algorithms in biomedical research and,

value.title: Expanding human-robot collaboration in manufacturing by training AI to detect human intention
value.excerpt: Machines and robots undoubtedly make life easier. They carry out jobs with precision and speed, and, unlike humans, they do not require breaks as they are never tired.

value.title: Chances Of Collisions Involving Urgently Underway Police Cars And AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Regrettably there are going to be instances of urgently underway police cars that collide with self-driving cars, though there are means to try and reduce those chances.

value.title: How to upskill your team to tackle AI and machine learning
value.excerpt: Levi Strauss & Co's Katia Walsh discusses her new machine learning bootcamp and the role upskilling and mentorship can play in humanizing AI.

value.title: He Built a Robot to Prove a Point About Refugees
value.excerpt: As Afghans flee the Taliban, the experiences of a fellow countryman, Saidullah Karimi, warn of tough times ahead, but also carry a message of hope.

value.title: EdTech language platform Duolingo ups the AI ante
value.excerpt: In the wake of a noted IPO, EdTech player Duolingo showed off AI-infused updates to its language lesson platform.

value.title: Schnuck Markets expanding use of Tally robots chainwide
value.excerpt: Schnuck Markets Inc. is expanding its use of Tally inventory-taking robots to all of its stores chainwide. Schnuck Markets said Thursday that a multiyear, full-scale rollout now will bring Tally robots to all 111 Schnucks stores.

value.title: Visually Impaired Paralympian Hit by Self-driving Bus in Athletes' Village
value.excerpt: A visually impaired Paralympian was hit by a self-driving bus in the athletes' village in Tokyo, suffering head and leg injuries, Japanese media said Friday.

value.title: ‘Good to Know’ headlines: Self-driving taxis and Flamin’ Hot Cheetos flavored Mountain Dew
value.excerpt: NBC News' Vicky Nguyen reports on a new app that is set to offer self-driving taxis, logging into virtual meetings using A.I., and Mountain Dew’s new Flamin’ Hot Cheetos inspired drink.

value.title: The Free-Speech Case for Facial Recognition | Opinion
value.excerpt: The right to communicate anonymously is important, but most would agree it shouldn't extend to people who commit violent crimes.

value.title: Amazon Web Services In Deal To Transform Sun Life Financial's Digital Services
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services, Inc. or AWS, an Amazon.com, Inc. company (AMZN), announced Friday a deal with Sun Life Financial Inc. (SLF, SLF.TO) to become its long-term strategic cloud technology provider. Sun Life will use AWS's cloud technologies,

value.title: Meet the voice behind MG Astor's AI assistant
value.excerpt: One of the highlights of the upcoming MG Astor is the personal AI assistant. MG has now revealed the voice behind this interactive robot.The carmaker has announced that the AI assistant in the upcoming

value.title: Here’s Why Nvidia Will Surpass Apple’s Valuation In 5 Years
value.excerpt: Nvidia can surpass Apple by capitalizing on the artificial intelligence economy, which will add an estimated $15 trillion to GDP. This is compared to the mobile economy that brought us gains in Apple,

value.title: Intel Launches AI for Workforce Program for Students in 18 Community Colleges
value.excerpt: Intel is announcing a major expansion of its Intel® AI for Workforce Program to help educate the next generation of U.S. technologists, engineers and inventors — and to help them land careers in their chosen fields,

value.title: Cruise is buying solar energy from California farmers to power its electric, self-driving fleet
value.excerpt: Cruise, the self-driving car company under General Motors, has launched a new initiative called Farm to Fleet that will allow the company to source solar power from farms in California’s Central Valley.

value.title: Recognize celebrities in images and videos using Amazon Rekognition
value.excerpt: The celebrity recognition feature in Amazon Rekognition automatically recognizes tens of thousands of well-known personalities in images and videos using machine learning (ML). Celebrity recognition significantly reduces the repetitive manual effort required to tag produced media content and make it

value.title: Robotics startup rents out automated machines to factories for as little as $10 an hour
value.excerpt: Companies struggling with a labor shortage and rising salaries are turning to robots for automated work and for those who can't afford a big expense, they're renting robots for as little as $10 per hour.

value.title: Zendesk acquires customer service automation startup Cleverly.ai
value.excerpt: Zendesk has acquired Cleverly.ai, a service automation startup that develops AI-powered tools to solve common customer problems.

value.title: Otter.ai expands automatic transcription assistant to Microsoft Teams, Google Meet and Cisco Webex
value.excerpt: AI-powered voice transcription service Otter.ai is expanding its Otter Assistant feature for Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Cisco Webex. Otter.ai first released this feature for Zoom users earlier this year in May.
